programme.desc: Two McLarens and a Red Bull form the front three on the starting grid, as Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri lead from Max Verstappen ahead of lights out at the Hungarian Grand Prix. (21.07)

programme.title: Hungarian F1 GP Highlights 2023
programme.desc: Rekindling memories of an unforgettable 2021 season, Lewis Hamilton has pole position with Max Verstappen joining the Mercedes man on the front row at the 2023 Hungarian Grand Prix. (23.07)

programme.title: Hungarian F1 GP Highlights 2022
programme.desc: For the first time in his career, George Russell occupies pole at the Hungarian Grand Prix - F1's final race before the summer break. The Ferrari duo line up behind the Mercedes. (31.07)

programme.title: Hungarian F1 GP Highlights 2021
programme.desc: The 2021 Hungarian Grand Prix arrives from the Hungaroring as the Formula 1 season continues. Lewis Hamilton starts on pole while Max Verstappen lines up in third.

programme.title: An Saoghal Droil aig Pol...
programme.desc: ...Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud. 40/52. The Spuds join Betty on a work trip across America. Will a surprising body swap help their American dreams come true?

programme.title: Dubhlain DIY (Instructions Not Included)
programme.desc: 4/5. A DIY competition with Derek 'Pluto' Murray. Farpais ùr DIY le Derek 'Pluto' Moireach.

programme.title: SpeakGaelic
programme.desc: 20/26. Professor Rob Ó Maolalaigh chats to Joy about dialects, and Calum Maclean is in Islay to learn more about the island's distinctive Gaelic.

programme.title: An Là
programme.desc: Naidheachdan ionadail, nàiseanta is eadar-nàiseanta gach là cuide ri fiosrachadh coimhearsnachd bho BBC ALBA. Local, national and international news and information from BBC ALBA.

programme.title: An Cuan Sgith, le Anne Lundon
programme.desc: 2/6. Anne Lundon goes in search of stories and people connected to the famous stretch of sea, known as The Minch.

programme.title: Am Buabhall Ameireaganach/The American Buffalo
programme.desc: 1/4. Sgeulachd mhòr mamal nàiseanta Ameireagaidh a cha mhòr a chaidh à bith. The dramatic story of how America's national mammal was taken to the brink of extinction.

programme.title: Fraochy Bay
programme.desc: 20/20. The colourful and unusual world of Fraochy Bay. The residents gather to toss their cabers and see who comes out on top.

programme.title: OMC
programme.desc: Annette and Magaidh are still trying to outdo each other, CalMac are of course causing more disruption and we hear more wisdom from Gael Gal. Contains adult humour.

programme.title: Sar-Sgeoil - The Cone-Gatherers
programme.desc: Cathy MacDonald explores the fact behind the fiction in the novel The Cone-Gatherers. Cathy Dhòmhnallach a' lorg fìrinn air cùl ficsean anns an nobhail The Cone-Gatherers.

programme.title: Seòid a' Chidsin - The Kitchen Coves
programme.desc: 4/6. Tha na seòid a' dèanamh biadh à Patagonia ann an earrainn seo. The lads create some Patagonian dishes in this episode.

programme.title: Alba Today
programme.desc: Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.

programme.title: Alba Today
programme.desc: Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.

programme.title: Treubh an Tuathanais (Big Barn Farm)
programme.desc: 15/20. Tha cuideigin a' falbh leis a' bhainne aig Madame! Saoil cò am mèirleach? Someone is stealing the milk from Madame! Who is the thief?

programme.title: Boban is Fuigheag
programme.desc: 25/40. Tha 'ad a' cluich tarraing an ròp an-diugh - no am b' fheàrr tarraing an clò a-ràdh ris? They're playing tug of war today, or should it be called tug of tweed?

programme.title: Sionnach agus Maigheach (Fox & Hare)
programme.desc: 8/26. Brush invites Hare, Fox, Owl and Tusk for a fancy game of croquet. Jack shows up uninvited and wants to play, too.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: 75/104. Tha Bing a' dèanamh ceann-ughach ach chaneil mòran foighidinn aige. Bing is making an eggy head but he is impatient for it to grow fast.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: 76/104. Tha iad uile feargach aig a' phàrtaidh dhèideag aig taigh Sula an-diugh. Everybody is angry at the toy party at Sula's house.

programme.title: Pompon Am Mathan Beag/Pompon Little Bear
programme.desc: 17/39. Pompon and Rita are busy digging a drain so as to get water to George's vegetable garden.

programme.title: Stòiridh
programme.desc: 65/80. A bedtime story for young children. Patsi Mackenzie reads An Jazz Chù, written by Maire Voigt and translated into Gaelic by Donald John MacLeod.

programme.title: An Teaghlach Rìoghail an...
programme.desc: ...Ath-dhoras/The Royals Next Door. 10/52. Tha an dealbh Rìoghail ga thogail an-diugh. The Royal portrait is being taken today.

programme.title: An Teaghlach Rìoghail an...
programme.desc: ...Ath-dhoras/The Royals Next Door. 11/52. Tha Stella 'son an dùbhradh-gealaich fhaicinn ach tha an Rìgh iomagaineach. Stella wishes to see the lunar eclipse but the King is worried.

programme.title: Clann Na Cruinne
programme.desc: 5/13. A young boy from Skye takes part in a challenge to climb a series of mountains that combined are equal in height to Mount Everest.

programme.title: Stri
programme.desc: 2/12. Tha Daniel a' farpais an aghaidh preasantairean CBBC ALBA ach saoil cò shoirbhicheas? Daniel competes against the CBBC ALBA presenters but who will emerge victorious?

programme.title: Flix
programme.desc: 11/13. Tha Greta is Flix ri mì-mhodh nuair a tha iad a' tighinn còmhla san sgoil! Greta and Flix are badly behaved when they come across one another in school!

programme.title: An Là
programme.desc: Naidheachdan ionadail, nàiseanta is eadar-nàiseanta gach là cuide ri fiosrachadh coimhearsnachd bho BBC ALBA. Local, national and international news and information from BBC ALBA.

programme.title: Machair

programme.title: Dàn
programme.desc: 2/12. Eilidh Cormack discusses the poem "Thig Trì Nithean Gun Iarraidh". Eilidh NicCarmaig le iomradh air faclan an òrain "Thig trì nithean gun iarraidh".

programme.title: Rùm Gu Rùm, Le Erica
programme.desc: 5/6. Erica Macpherson goes on a creative design adventure through the Highlands and Islands of Scotland.

programme.title: Greim-Bìdh le Gregor
programme.desc: 5/6. At a community-run growing project, Gregor picks up fresh parsnips. If you can do carrot cake, then why not parsnip cake?

programme.title: An t-Eilean/The Island
programme.desc: 3/4. The case is coming to a close, but Kat still believes the Macleans are hiding something. Contains some strong language and some violent scenes.

programme.title: Beat the Drum: Dìleab Runrig
programme.desc: 2/2. As the tour reaches Denmark, the band begin to look ahead to their biggest show yet. A' ruighinn na Danmhairg, tha an còmhlan a' coimhead air adhart ris a' chuirm as motha aca.

programme.title: Binneas - Na Trads
programme.desc: 2/7. Peatbog Faeries clàraichte aig Duaisean nan Trads, 2023. Peatbog Faeries recorded at the Trad Awards in 2023.

programme.title: Crá
programme.desc: 2/6. As Sabine's funeral takes place, the finger of suspicion points towards her son Conall and her husband Art. Contains strong language.

programme.title: Skipinnish aig a' Chaisteal (Shorts)
programme.desc: 6/10. Skipinnish le The Island aig cuirm-chiùil bho Chaisteal Dhùn Èideann. Skipinnish perform The Island at a concert from Edinburgh Castle.

programme.title: Jasper Carrott: Back to the Front
programme.desc: A compilation of the best moments from Jasper Carrott's stand-up series Back to the Front. Contains adult humour.

programme.title: Wogan with Sue Lawley
programme.desc: Sue Lawley is joined by Jasper Carrott, Sheila Minto and Glen Campbell.

programme.title: The Trials of Oscar Pistorius
programme.desc: 2/4. Oscar Pistorius's sporting achievements become a distant memory when evidence is revealed. Contains some strong language.

programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Magnificent Monuments
programme.desc: 5/6. Fred Dibnah looks at some of the great achievements in civil engineering, from the earliest wrought iron suspension bridge to the Channel Tunnel.

programme.title: Handmade in Japan
programme.desc: 2/3. Series celebrating traditional Japanese crafts. On Amami Oshima in the southern oceans, we follow the elaborate handmade production of a traditional Japanese kimono.

programme.title: Vienna: Empire, Dynasty and Dream
programme.desc: 2/3. The story of how Vienna, triumphant after the Ottoman threat receded at the end of the 17th century, was transformed from a fortress into a great cultural capital.

programme.desc: Caxton: 'Lots' of fraught auction antics in the riotous reality series. Heavy D risks having his fingers burned. New boys Glyn and James rub the old guard up the wrong way.

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Leeds: Sean Kelly starts the bidding in the uber-popular reality series. A new duo are in town and they aren't afraid to throw their weight around. Sam and Ione clash again.

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Kent: Sean Kelly keeps order in the volatile reality series that sees rival auction experts battle for unseen storage units. A double car lot is up for grabs in Broadstairs.

programme.title: Railroad Australia

programme.title: Top Gear

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson trials BMW's lifestyle off-roader the X3, Richard Hammond tests the Corvette C6, James May finds out what fits in the back of a Volvo V50, and Patrick Kielty guests.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall
programme.desc: Rick enjoys one of the world's most scenic ferry crossings, rustles up a vegetarian tart, and investigates the Cornish influence on Oscar-winning composer Malcolm Arnold.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall

programme.desc: Running On Empty. The countdown to the dark days causes a mad dash for food. Chris and Jessi venture onto thin ice to net whitefish while Pat turns to the town dump to feed his pigs. S6, Ep5

programme.title: Homestead Rescue: Raney Ranch
programme.desc: Fire On The Forty. An inferno engulfs Marty and Mollee's cabin at the onset of winter, and the Raneys rush to complete the unfinished clifftop cabin with heat, water and power. S1, Ep9

programme.title: Homestead Rescue: Raney Ranch
programme.desc: On Thin Ice. Marty attempts a treacherous trip across a frozen river. And, Misty and Maciah build a pump house to secure the family's new water source on the Upper 20. S1, Ep10

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: The Bushmen are desperate for a breakthrough after a run of bad luck. And the Young Guns are under financial strain and fall out over their new mine. S3, Ep8

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: The Tunnel Rats are under extra pressure as rival miners close in on their claim. And, the Bushmen must brave an abandoned mine to remove a dead animal. S3, Ep9

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Turf Wars. Sig pushes Mandy to invade the Cornelia Marie's ground, sparking a battle for the crab. Plus, a Saga distress signal sends panic across the fleet. S14, Ep17

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: No Safe Harbor. A severe arctic gale batters the fleet, forcing captains to fight extreme wind and waves. For a second time, a greenhorn's life hangs in the balance on Summer Bay. S14, Ep18

programme.title: Expedition From Hell: The Lost Tapes
programme.desc: One of the most experienced team members is fired. The team is pushed to the brink of death when they get lost in a treacherous desert. S1, Ep2

programme.title: Expedition Unknown

programme.title: Jeremy Wade's Dark Waters
programme.desc: Italy's Lake Monster. Fisherman and adventurer, Jeremy Wade, travels to Lake Garda in northern Italy to investigate a 16th century monster fish. What secrets is the lake hiding? S1, Ep4

programme.title: Naked And Afraid
programme.desc: Frozen And Afraid. Dropped onto an Alaskan glacier, all-star survivalists Laura and Steven stave off frostbite and hypothermia. Their skills and survivor instinct are tested. S5, Ep10

programme.title: Naked And Afraid
programme.desc: Honduran Hell. In the Honduran rainforest, a survivalist and a hard-headed detective try to thrive for 21 days. But, jaguars, fire ants and a debilitating injury may stop them. S5, Ep11

programme.desc: The Zazzy Substitution: The guys are concerned when a heartbroken Sheldon starts bulk buying cats after he breaks up with Amy, so Leonard tries to get Sheldon's mother to visit.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Hot Troll Deviation: An embarrassing secret of Howard's comes to light as he tries to win back Bernadette. Sheldon and Raj have trouble working together.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Do Pizza Bots Dream of Electric Guitars: Homer tries to reunite a mechanical band from his youth, but film and TV creator JJ Abrams gets hold of them first.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Pimemento: Adrian Pimento shows up unexpectedly to seek Jake and Charles' help after claiming that someone is trying to kill him. But he keeps losing his memory...

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Debbie: When cocaine and weapons are stolen from the evidence lock-up, the squad must investigate the Nine-Nine itself.

programme.title: Celebs Go Dating
programme.desc: Brand new series: Back in London, The Chase star Mark Labbett joins the agency, Kerry and Jon go on their second dates, and Liv and Sam make emotional trips to the agency.

programme.title: Below Deck Sailing Yacht
programme.desc: Brand new series - Much Ado About Crushing: The fight for Chase's affection heats up. And the drama bubbles over as a wild night out in a hot tub ends with an unexpected bang.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Crisis of Faith and Octopus Aliens: When Mary's usually robust religious faith is shaken by a tragedy in the community, Sheldon becomes an unlikely ally.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Financial Secret and Fish Sauce: George Sr asks Sheldon to keep a secret from Mary, but the stress of not being honest drives Sheldon to hide at Tam's house.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Jimmy Jab Games II: Jake decides it's time for another edition of the Jimmy Jab Games when Terry suggests that he's way more responsible than he used to be.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Summer Lovin': When Haley tries to stop Andy from proposing to Beth, Haley and Andy both have to cope with their emotions, which they each do in their own special way.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Day Alex Left for College: Phil and Claire feel snubbed when Alex gives them the wrong college move-in date to avoid them making it a big deal.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip from Rude Tube's naughty little sister, Rude(ish) Tube, featuring sports of the lawnmower, motorbike and bicycle variety.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Finn McCool's: Gordon Ramsay visits Finn McCool's, a traditional Irish pub in the Hamptons, where the family feuding has got out of hand. Can Gordon mediate?

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Mole: When an Internal Affairs investigator reveals that there's a mole in the precinct, Peralta and Holt must find out who it is before Wuntch catches on.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake and Sophia: Peralta hits it off with a woman in a bar, only to find out that she's the defence attorney representing a suspect who he wants to put in jail.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Man Who Came to Be Dinner: A new amusement park ride transports the Simpsons to Kang and Kodos's home planet, where they're held captive in a zoo.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart's New Friend: At the circus, Homer is hypnotised into believing that he's only 10 years old, then gets stuck in his new age and ends up bonding with Bart.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Research Study and Czechoslovakian Wedding Pastries: Dr Sturgis recommends Sheldon and Missy for a university research study on twins, but Mary is unhappy.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Seven Deadly Sins and a Small Carl Sagan: Mary clashes with Sheldon's drama teacher Mr Lundy over plans for a Halloween haunted house fundraiser for the church.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: SuperShowerBabyBowl: Jay is hosting a Super Bowl party, while Claire hosts a baby shower for Haley - and they're both at Jay's house. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Red Alert: Lily has reached a womanly milestone that Cam and Mitch are not prepared for at all. So they call in reinforcements...

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Jiminy Conjecture: Leonard and Penny feel awkward around each other after their romantic liaison, while Sheldon and Howard take bets to determine a species of cricket.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Gothowitz Deviation: Sheldon tries to modify Penny's behaviour, and rewards her with chocolate when she does what he wants, while Howard and Raj go to a goth nightclub.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Pirate Solution: Raj must find a job or he'll be sent back to India, so he accepts an offer of work from Sheldon. Leonard and Penny try to get some time for themselves.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Creepy Candy Coating Corollary: Due to a childhood snub, Sheldon is irked when Star Trek actor Wil Wheaton (guest starring as himself) takes part in the same contest as him.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Windbreaker City: The team are assigned the role of hostages at a Homeland Security counter-terrorism training exercise.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Wednesday Incident: When Peralta notices that Captain Holt is in a bad mood, he teams up with Holt's husband Kevin to find out what's gone wrong.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Springfield Splendor: Lisa and Marge team up on a graphic novel that becomes a musical. But Marge takes all the credit...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Whistler's Father: Maggie reveals a hidden talent, which Grampa tries to exploit. Marge gets a job as a decorator for the mob.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Staircase Implementation: Leonard tells Penny about how he and Sheldon became friends, and the origins of the roommate agreement.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Lunar Excitation: Raj registers Sheldon for online dating and finds the perfect match: the female version of Sheldon. Penny seduces Leonard while she's drunk.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Robotic Manipulation: Penny tags along to Sheldon's first date with a woman he's been texting for months. Howard finds a new use for a robotic arm.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Cruciferous Vegetable Amplification: Sheldon realises that he won't live long enough to download his consciousness into a robot body, so he tries to extend his lifespan.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Panic on the Streets of Springfield: Lisa develops an imaginary friendship with a morose British singer. Homer gets a powerful truck.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Man from G.R.A.M.P.A.: A British secret agent comes to Springfield on the trail of a Russian spy. Guest starring Stephen Fry.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Moe Baby Blues: Moe becomes Maggie's babysitter after saving her from a car accident when he was about to end it all. She gives him a reason to live, but Homer isn't happy.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Burger Kings: Mr Burns gets into the plant-based burger business. But Lisa is convinced that he has an ulterior motive.

programme.title: New: Below Deck Sailing Yacht
programme.desc: Brand new series - Fraught Mess: A group of friends hop onboard looking for luxury. But will they get it? Chef Cloyce struggles with a seven-course dinner and difficult diners.

programme.title: New: Celebs Go Dating
programme.desc: Brand new series: A not-so-smitten kitten Kerry pops into the agency for a chat, while things hot up for Louis. Liv tries to remain positive on her date, but things turn sour!

programme.title: First Dates Valentine's
programme.desc: It's Valentine's night, but 'clubbing queen' Amanda's looking for a guy who's not too romantic or keen too soon. And can businessman Brendan finally find love after almost 1000 dates?

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Can two singletons find love based on naked attraction alone? Student Marlie needs to stay away from bad boys, while Adam from Bradford craves a woman with no secrets.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Desperation Emanation: Leonard realises he's the only one of the gang with no girlfriend. Sheldon wants to get rid of his when she hatches a plan for him to meet her mother.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Manger Things: A secret from Flanders' past is revealed, and we discover a room in the Simpsons' home that we've never seen before.

programme.title: Rick and Morty [adult swim]

programme.title: New: Mike Tyson Mysteries
programme.desc: [adult swim] Brand new series - A Mystery in Little Italy: Animated comedy with Mike Tyson. What do you do with baby octopus, plantains, smoked kippers and mushroom soup?

programme.desc: Trying: Jake and Amy work an uncrackable case while Holt adjusts to a new beat. Hitchcock looks for the love of his life.

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Closet Case: Phil helps Haley convince Claire to allow Dylan to move in temporarily, but when he sees how intimate living together means, he has second thoughts.

programme.desc: She Crazy: Phil is excited about project 'hatch the duck eggs', and even builds a whole habitat for them, but no one else seems as keen about the project.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Lockdown: Peralta is left in charge of the precinct at Thanksgiving because Holt and Jeffords are away, but chaos ensues when a strange package is delivered.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: USPIS: While trying to catch a drug dealer, Peralta and Boyle join forces with Agent Jack Danger (Ed Helms), a pompous investigator at the US Postal Inspection Service.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Walking Big & Tall: Marge urges Homer to lose weight. Instead, he finds a support group that encourages him to embrace his size. Lisa writes an anthem for Springfield.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: Young Sheldon

programme.title: Young Sheldon

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Wild: Mitch, Cam and Phil crash Jay's annual hiking trip to find an elusive bald eagle. And Gloria, Alex, Claire and Haley get together to plan a baby shower.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Stand by Your Man: Dylan and Luke are impressed by Bill's tales of heroism as a firefighter, which makes Phil feel emasculated. So he invites the guys over for male bonding.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: Brussels, My Love?
programme.desc: From the economy to the climate and the EU's role in world affairs, this talk show sheds light on European affairs and the issues that impact on our daily lives as Europeans.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: (2007) True crime thriller directed by Ridley Scott. An outcast New York cop (Russell Crowe) is charged with bringing down entrepreneurial Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas (Denzel Washington).

programme.title: Pixie
programme.desc: (2020) Dark comedy with Olivia Cooke, Alec Baldwin and Colm Meaney. A young woman devises a series of elaborate heists and schemes to fund a new life.

programme.title: Bitch Ass
programme.desc: (2022) Slasher horror. It's 1999 LA, and a bunch of kids get sent to rip off a house in their hood. Unfortunately, it belongs to a masked serial killer who likes to play games... literally.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: (1994) Festive family drama. Richard Attenborough stars as a department store Santa who insists he's the real Santa Claus. But can he prove it in court?

programme.title: The Personal History of David...
programme.desc: ...Copperfield Interview Special: Director Armando Iannucci and actor Dev Patel, who stars in the title role, talk about bringing Charles Dickens' beloved novel to the screen.

programme.title: The Kid Who Would Be King
programme.desc: (2019) Fantasy adventure. A 12-year-old from modern-day suburbia finds King Arthur's sword Excalibur and must save the country from a sinister sorceress. With Patrick Stewart.

programme.title: The Electrical Life of Louis...
programme.desc: ...Wain Interview Special: Stars Benedict Cumberbatch and Claire Foy talk about making director Will Sharpe's eccentric biopic of artist and inventor Louis Wain.

programme.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
programme.desc: (1970) Oscar-winning drama portraying the bombing of Pearl Harbor, from both American and Japanese perspectives. With Joseph Cotten and So Yamamura.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: (2019) Action comedy with Kristen Stewart, Naomi Scott and Ella Balinska. When an engineer blows the whistle on a deadly device, the Angels put their lives on the line to save the planet.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: (2022) Going-for-gold action. Tom Holland and Mark Wahlberg compare abs as they scour the globe for an olde explorer's lost gold. The heat is on. The time is right. Only the best survive.

programme.title: Jackass Forever
programme.desc: (2022) Outrageous adult comedy with Johnny Knoxville. The Jackasses reunite to test if older really is wiser by inflicting more playfully real pain on each other - just for fun of course.

programme.title: Funny Pages
programme.desc: (2022) Dark, adults-only, coming-of-age comedy about a troubled schoolboy who quits education to become a comic book artist - with the help of an array of questionable older men...

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: (2009) Martial arts adventure. Justin Chatwin stars as the leader of a mystical band of warriors who are out to save the world from the ancient demon Lord Piccolo. With James Marsters.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: (2018) High-octane sci-fi action adventure starring Hailee Steinfeld. When Charlie drives home a clapped-out VW Beetle, she gets more than she bargained for: a huge robotic alien.

programme.title: Prince Valiant
programme.desc: (1954) Swashbuckling adventure. One of King Arthur's courtiers, the Viking Prince Valiant (Robert Wagner) uncovers the evil Sir Brack's (James Mason) plot to kill the king. Can he foil him?

programme.title: Spies in Disguise
programme.desc: (2019) Animated spy comedy caper with the voice of Will Smith. The 'world's most awesome spy' gets framed and has to go undercover as a pigeon to prove his innocence.

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: (1999) Teen comedy with Julia Stiles and Heath Ledger. A student is furious to discover her prom date was bribed by her sister to invite her. But confusion ensues when he falls for her.

programme.title: Nope
programme.desc: (2022) Western-infused sci-fi chiller with Daniel Kaluuya and Keke Palmer as cash-strapped horse trainers who try to supplement their income by filming alien goings-on at their ranch.

programme.title: Ready or Not
programme.desc: (2019) Wickedly funny comedy horror starring Samara Weaving. A bride finds herself being hunted down by her new in-laws when she is asked to observe a deadly family tradition.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: (2019) Horror based on Stephen King's novel. Seeking a quiet life, a family moves to a rural setting. But there's a road with speeding trucks and a pet cemetery that resurrects the dead...

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: (2007) Supernatural thriller. Alexander Ludwig stars as The Seeker, who has the task of finding six items hidden throughout time, which the scary forces of The Dark are also looking for.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of...
programme.desc: ...Unfortunate Events: (2004) Gothic family comedy starring Jim Carrey as the evil, scheming Count Olaf, who'll do whatever it takes to deprive three young orphans of their inheritance.

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: (1989) Comedy-thriller starring Tom Hanks. A cop investigates a murder to which there's just one witness: Hooch, a slobbering, beer-drinking French mastiff, who now needs 24/7 protection.

programme.title: Mysterious Island
programme.desc: (1961) Sci-fi adventure based on Jules Verne's novel. Two men fleeing the US Civil War find an island inhabited by monsters (animated by Ray Harryhausen) and the mysterious Captain Nemo.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: (2004) Breezy body-swap romcom. Following a disastrous birthday party, teen Jenna wishes she was '30, flirty and thriving'. And boom, she's Jennifer Garner with a fancy flat and a cool job.

programme.title: Darkman
programme.desc: (1990) Liam Neeson and Frances McDormand star in Sam Raimi's crime-fighting action-fantasy. A scientist uses his invention to seek revenge on his attackers.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: (2020) Fighty, satirical horror that upset Donald Trump. Hilary Swank plays a rich lefty who likes hunting working class people to the death. But she didn't reckon on Betty Gilpin.

programme.desc: (2007) True crime thriller directed by Ridley Scott. An outcast New York cop (Russell Crowe) is charged with bringing down entrepreneurial Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas (Denzel Washington).

programme.desc: (1999) Teen comedy with Julia Stiles and Heath Ledger. A student is furious to discover her prom date was bribed by her sister to invite her. But confusion ensues when he falls for her.

programme.title: Nope
programme.desc: (2022) Western-infused sci-fi chiller with Daniel Kaluuya and Keke Palmer as cash-strapped horse trainers who try to supplement their income by filming alien goings-on at their ranch.

programme.title: Ready or Not
programme.desc: (2019) Wickedly funny comedy horror starring Samara Weaving. A bride finds herself being hunted down by her new in-laws when she is asked to observe a deadly family tradition.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: (2019) Horror based on Stephen King's novel. Seeking a quiet life, a family moves to a rural setting. But there's a road with speeding trucks and a pet cemetery that resurrects the dead...

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: (2007) Supernatural thriller. Alexander Ludwig stars as The Seeker, who has the task of finding six items hidden throughout time, which the scary forces of The Dark are also looking for.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of...
programme.desc: ...Unfortunate Events: (2004) Gothic family comedy starring Jim Carrey as the evil, scheming Count Olaf, who'll do whatever it takes to deprive three young orphans of their inheritance.

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: (1989) Comedy-thriller starring Tom Hanks. A cop investigates a murder to which there's just one witness: Hooch, a slobbering, beer-drinking French mastiff, who now needs 24/7 protection.

programme.title: Mysterious Island
programme.desc: (1961) Sci-fi adventure based on Jules Verne's novel. Two men fleeing the US Civil War find an island inhabited by monsters (animated by Ray Harryhausen) and the mysterious Captain Nemo.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: (2004) Breezy body-swap romcom. Following a disastrous birthday party, teen Jenna wishes she was '30, flirty and thriving'. And boom, she's Jennifer Garner with a fancy flat and a cool job.

programme.title: Darkman
programme.desc: (1990) Liam Neeson and Frances McDormand star in Sam Raimi's crime-fighting action-fantasy. A scientist uses his invention to seek revenge on his attackers.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: (2020) Fighty, satirical horror that upset Donald Trump. Hilary Swank plays a rich lefty who likes hunting working class people to the death. But she didn't reckon on Betty Gilpin.

programme.title: Under the Bridge
programme.desc: Past and present wounds entwine as Rebecca and Cam's alliance is tested. The Virks discuss taking matters into their own hands, and the teens use a school dance as cover for their escape plan as another life is threatened

programme.title: Unwind with STV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Ninja Warrior UK
programme.desc: Ben Shephard, Rochelle Humes and Chris Kamara host the grand final of the obstacle course challenge, with the final five competitors from across the nation testing their strength, speed and courage. Those who make it to the end of the adrenaline-fuelled mission face one final task - scaling the heights of a tower named Mount Midoriyama - as they battle it out for the title of Ninja Warrior UK

programme.title: Good Morning Britain
programme.desc: Morning magazine featuring a lively mix of news and current affairs, plus health, entertainment and lifestyle features

programme.title: Lorraine
programme.desc: Early morning chat show presented by Lorraine Kelly, with celebrity interviews, entertainment news, cooking tips, fashion features and musical guests.

programme.title: This Morning
programme.desc: A mix of celebrity chat, lifestyle features, advice and competitions

programme.title: James Martin's Great British Adventure
programme.desc: James crosses over the Irish Sea to Northern Ireland, where he is joined by famous local chef Paul Rankin. Their first port of call is the Giant's Causeway, where James cooks a fish stew for the crowds, followed by a visit to a family farm in Limavady, where Paul learns how their award-winning rapeseed oil is produced. Things get competitive as the chefs compete in a hovercraft race, and finally James takes to the seas to fish for mackerel

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: The key headlines from the day so far

programme.title: STV News and Weather
programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: STV Racing: Live from York
programme.desc: Ed Chamberlin and Francesca Cumani present coverage of day one of the Ebor Meeting, featuring the 3.35 Juddmonte International Stakes and races at 1.50, 2.25, 3.00 and 4.10. With analysis from Jason Weaver, Adele Mulrennan and Ruby Walsh, reports by Oli Bell, Mick Fitzgerald and Matt Chapman, and commentary from Richard Hoiles

programme.title: Tipping Point: Best Ever Finals
programme.desc: Compilation of some of the most dramatic endgames from the arcade-themed quiz show hosted by Ben Shephard, in which the last contestant standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as Philomena from Leeds, Samantha from London, Austin from Surrey and Kevin from Sheffield pit their wits against one of the ruthless Chasers in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught

programme.title: STV News at Six and Weather
programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: A round-up of the day's news headlines and talking points from the UK and around the world

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Tracy's suspicion about Nate's move is raised when the removal man shows up, while Vinny is in turmoil as he tries to pull himself together. Mack is offered a lift by John and discovers a clue in his vehicle, while Moira is left with food for thought when Celia tells her to get the best price for her land and get out of farming

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Kit and Sarah's actions come back to bite them, Dee-Dee throws caution to the wind with Ollie, and Tracy guesses the real object of Carl's desire

programme.title: The Fortune Hotel
programme.desc: Stephen welcomes the guests poolside at the hotel for a light-hearted yet revealing Hotel Game where instincts are put to the test before coconut chaos erupts as the guests arrive at a sun-drenched beach for one of the most dramatic Day Trip Challenges of the series - racing to build the tallest tower from scattered cans, the pairs must balance speed, strategy and sabotage to gain a critical edge before another tense Night Cap

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Scotland Tonight
programme.desc: Current affairs programme delving into stories beyond the headlines. Featuring live studio debates and comprehensive analysis, it sheds light on key stories impacting the nation and its surroundings

programme.title: Matthew Perry: A Hollywood Tragedy
programme.desc: Friends star Perry's sudden death in October 2023 shocked the world. A known addict, he was found to have ketamine in his system and months later five individuals were charged with illegally supplying him the drug. This documentary explores Perry's rise to fame and his tragic final days with insights from castmates, friends, law enforcement and Perry's own candid accounts

He also serves up a plate of salt and pepper squid and prawns for comedian Joe Pasquale

programme.title: Tom Kerridge Cooks Spain
programme.desc: The chef journeys from Extremadura to Murcia in his vintage food truck as he heads out on Lake Orellena to discover secret spots that are best for catching crayfish. He also cooks up a celebration of an ultimate take on a crayfish cocktail. Tom's journey then takes him to Murcia, where local producer Shelley shows him what it takes to harvest the Piel de Sapo, a melon loved in Spain and gaining popularity in the UK

programme.title: The Fortune Hotel
programme.desc: Only five pairs remain as things turn frosty with a Hotel Game like no other. Guests pick ice lollies with unexpected flavours and even more unexpected consequences. While some sticks spell safety, others hand players a power to target their rivals. Later, it's off to the historic streets of St George's for a high-energy Day Trip Challenge involving hotel staff and a well-known phrase

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Sci-fi action adventure starring James Franco and Freida Pinto. When scientist Will Rodman's programme of drug experiments to find a cure for Alzheimer's disease is shut down he secretly takes an offspring from one of the chimpanzees he was using into his home and names him Caesar. Caesar has inherited the effects of the trial drug and begins to show remarkable intelligence, a development that will put him on a violent collision course with the humans who have abused him.

programme.title: James Martin's Great British Adventure
programme.desc: Still in Hampshire, James views ex-formula one racer Jody Scheckter's epic car collection, and learns of his passion for buffalo mozzarella, which he makes in his dairy. James uses some of the cheese in his buffalo mozzarella, blackberry and beetroot salad, before crossing into Sussex to don fancy dress and experience the Goodwood Revival, which celebrates motorsport from the 1940s to the 1960s. programme.title: James Martin's Great British Adventure
programme.desc: James crosses over the Irish Sea to Northern Ireland, where he is joined by famous local chef Paul Rankin. Things get competitive as the chefs compete in a hovercraft race, and finally James takes to the seas to fish for mackerel

programme.desc: Friends star Perry's sudden death in October 2023 shocked the world. This documentary explores Perry's rise to fame and his tragic final days with insights from castmates, friends, law enforcement and Perry's own candid accounts

When scientist Will Rodman's programme of drug experiments to find a cure for Alzheimer's disease is shut down he secretly takes an offspring from one of the chimpanzees he was using into his home and names him Caesar. Caesar has inherited the effects of the trial drug and begins to show remarkable intelligence, a development that will put him on a violent collision course with the humans who have abused him.
